WORDSTAT software proximity of keywords analysis: interoperability versus linkage
A proximity analysis of the selected two keywords by WORDSTAT software (Provalis Research, Montreal, Canada) was performed, and the data retrieved were analysed in Microsoft Excel (Figure 5).

The only word with a similar proximity to the two words in the analysis was “data.”
